songs.title: I Did It
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Yeah. Fire in the homosphere. Nah I did it nigga. Bullet holes in your homie. Nigga I did it. Like candid out spitting nigga I spit it. I'm the nigga you love to hate my nigga
It's fire in the homosphere. Nah I did it nigga. Bullet holes in your homie. Nigga I did it. Like candid out spitting nigga I spit it. I'm the nigga you love to hate my nigga

[Verse 1]
I love to smoke weed muh fukka
I did it. I did it
Them niggas talking about running in your spot
No kinding. Niggas bumping your homies out a lot did it
I did it. I did it
Dogging them niggas out. Running up through your house. I wonder who slap that nigga's girl?
I did it. I did it
Pushing the front line and homies pushing from behind. Keeping the DPG'ed up
I did it. I did it
Nigga Kurupt riding to the sun will come up

[Chorus]

[Verse 2]
That nigga called you a busta
I did it. I did it
Fire up muh fucka. Let me show how we bounce up and down in and out hitting in and out
Riding all around South Central all around the south. Nigga I'm bum first
I did it. I did it
Spit that venom first
I did it. I did it
I spit that hammer burst
I spit it. I spit it
Get it and don't forget it nigga. Dope fuck niggas. Bound to get banged on and we doing the banging
Dogpound Gansta ganging remaining. From here to Lithuania, Egypt to Romania
Ain't no gangsta unification I'm just banging ya. I'm going let off on your homie
I did it. I did it
I'm going dome ya cause trying to dome  me. I got 45 reasons in my hand and 47 in the truck
We coming straight we ain't no punks. Mutha fuckas see it

[Chorus]

[Verse 3]
Yeah and you don't really want to fuck with Gotti. With Gotti. That nigga just too much
It's Young Gotti. Gotti. It gets Gotti the future the past. It's just me, myself and I and Das. Das
It's just you, your homies, your block, the cops. You roll with the NARCS old squad and marks
We gonna smash you, your homie, your block, your ass. In the club she's pussy popping shacking ass
And I like that. Pull it up and bring it right back. Now tell me do you like that. Imma slap her on her ass
I did it. I did it
Watch you give her all your cash. First to thump and first to blast
I did it. I did it
Kurupt and Das up on that ass. Lil' bustas we jack for cash
I did it. I did it
So mutha fucking quick and mutha fucking fast. Nigga...

[Chorus]
